ygData.subject: Re: Cazic Thule slain on Innoruuk.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Good job.  Those upgraded HT s hurt bad. ... Wow... same thing with me.  I didnt get to see Draco fall, cause I was so tired.  But I did nap and come back
ygData.messageBody:
> We also took down CT this weekend on E'ci, first time Fear had successfully
> been broken since it was "enhanced".

Good job. Those upgraded HT's hurt bad.

> I unfortunately passed out shortly
> after the Dracoliche fight around 4am Sunday morning,

Wow... same thing with me. I didnt get to see Draco fall, cause
I was so tired. But I did nap and come back for CT.

> So about 50 hours of fear-fighting for 1 friggin piece of carmine armor,
> and I didn't even get it.

I think a few carmine pieces dropped. I know at aleast one did for
sure. We had to let a lot of warrior Amyg loot rot, along with necro
armor. <sigh> Hate to let stuff rot.

Got monk arms, cleric belts, shaman belts, ranger legs, druid legs,
war gloves, fluxblade, etc. The list goes on, but still the loot
was very weak. In 48 hours, and many mobs killed, I'd say only
20 things dropped. 5 of which rotted, I'd guess.

Ah well. I hate Verant, but you didn't hear that from me.

Harm.
